1_Iyar.0: On the 7th of Iyar, the dedication of the walls of Jerusalem, eulogies should not be given.
1_Iyar.2: On  the  14 this  Minor  Pesach  [Pesach Sheni],  eulogies  should  not  be  given and there should not be a fast.
1_Iyar.4: On the 23rd, the siege forces left Jerusalem.â€Ž
1_Iyar.6: On the 27th, the crowns were removed from Jerusalem, eulogies should not be given
